title: Exempts certain items from fire district spending limits
summary: Exempts the amount attributable to charges for leased telephone lines for fire alarm systems from spending limits imposed upon fire districts.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          834

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. RABBITT, FINCH -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A.
         CROUCH, WEISENBERG -- read once and referred to the Committee on Local
         Governments

       AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to exemptions from the  spend-
         ing limits of fire districts

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 18 of section 176 of the town law is amended by
    2  adding a new paragraph 17 to read as follows:
    3    (17) THE PAYMENT OF CHARGES FOR LEASED TELEPHONE  LINES  IN  ORDER  TO
    4  MAINTAIN  AN  ADEQUATE FIRE ALARM SYSTEM PURSUANT TO SUBDIVISION FIFTEEN
    5  OF THIS SECTION.
    6    S 2. This act shall take effect on the first of January next  succeed-
    7  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01624-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to exemptions from the spending limits of fire districts
